statements: SELECT * FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id > 10
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE '%Sony%'
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS products_count FROM Manufacturers GROUP BY manufacturer_name ORDER BY products_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturers
SELECT * FROM manufacturers;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_id FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT manufacturer_name, product_name FROM manufacturers JOIN products ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = products.manufacturer_id ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products JOIN manufacturers ON products.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products JOIN manufacturers ON products.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id WHERE product_id < 5;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products JOIN manufacturers ON products.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(product_id), manufacturer_name FROM products JOIN manufacturers ON products.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT wholesaler_id, wholesaler_name FROM Wholesalers ORDER BY wholesaler_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Retailers WHERE wholesaler_id = 5;
SELECT retailer_name FROM Retailers WHERE retailer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name;

SELECT retailers.retailer_name, wholesalers.wholesaler_name, manufacturers.manufacturer_name FROM Retailers retailers INNER JOIN Wholesalers wholesalers ON retailers.wholesaler_id = wholesalers.wholesaler_id INNER JOIN Manufacturers manufacturers ON wholesalers.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM Wholesalers WHERE wholesaler_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;

SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, wholesaler_name, retailer_name FROM product JOIN manufacturer ON product.manufacturer_id = manufacturer.manufacturer_id JOIN wholesaler ON product.wholesaler_id = wholesaler.wholesaler_id JOIN retailer ON product.retailer_id = retailer.retailer_id;
SELECT * FROM wholesaler ORDER BY wholesaler_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product WHERE wholesaler_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wholesaler WHERE wholesaler_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, retailer_name FROM product JOIN retailer ON product.retailer_id = retailer.retailer_id WHERE product.manufacturer_id = 2;

SELECT manufacturer_name, product_name, wholesaler_location FROM manufacturer JOIN product ON manufacturer.manufacturer_id = product.manufacturer_id JOIN wholesaler ON product.wholesaler_id = wholesaler.wholesaler_id;
SELECT * FROM retailer WHERE retailer_location = 'Chicago' ORDER BY retailer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT wholesaler_name, location FROM wholesaler WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT movement_id, movement_type, movement_date FROM movement ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product WHERE retailer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE '%a%' AND location='New York';
SELECT * FROM movement WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND movement_date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;

SELECT product.product_name, retailer.retailer_name, movement.movement_type FROM product JOIN retailer ON product.retailer_id = retailer.retailer_id JOIN movement ON product.product_id = movement.product_id;
